类 AdvertiseView

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
view.AdvertiseView
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class AdvertiseView extends javafx.stage.Stage
View for advertisement. Showing a video to users. Additional task for cookbook.
作者:
Yan Yi
